summary.para: Represents a web control, which enables you to add the functionality of popup windows to your web application.
Initializes a new instance of the ASPxPopupControl class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxPopupControl.ASPxPopupControl.AllowDragging

summary.para: Gets or sets a value specifying whether a popup window can be dragged by end users.

member.value: true, if end users can drag a popup window; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxPopupControl.ASPxPopupControl.ShowShadow

summary.para: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether a popup window casts a shadow.

member.value: true if a popup window casts a shadow; otherwise false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxPopupControl.ASPxPopupControl.Target

summary.para: Gets or sets a window or frame at which to target the contents of the URLs associated with links in a popup window's header and footer.

member.value: A string which identifies a window or frame at which to target the URL content.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxPopupControl.ASPxPopupControl.Text

summary.para: Gets or sets the text displayed within a popup window's content region.

member.value: A string value that specifies a window's content text.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxPopupControl.ASPxPopupControl.Top

summary.para: Gets or sets the y-coordinate of the default popup window's top side.

member.value: An integer value specifying the y-coordinate of the default popup window's top side.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxPopupControl.ASPxPopupControl.Visible

summary.para: Gets or sets a value specifying the current popup control's visibility.

member.value: true if the popup control is visible; otherwise false

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxPopupControl.ASPxPopupControl.WindowContentTemplate

summary.para: Gets or sets a common template used to display the content region of all popup windows from the collection.

member.value: An object that supports the System.Web.UI.ITemplate interface and contains a template used to display a window's content region.

summary.para: Occurs after a popup window has been bound to a data source.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxPopupControl.ASPxPopupControl.WindowFooterTemplate

summary.para: Gets or sets a common template used to display the footer's content of all popup windows from the collection.

member.value: An object that supports the System.Web.UI.ITemplate interface and contains a template used to display the content of a window's footer.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxPopupControl.ASPxPopupControl.WindowHeaderTemplate

summary.para: Gets or sets a common template used to display the header's content of all popup windows from the collection.

member.value: An object that supports the System.Web.UI.ITemplate interface and contains a template used to display the content of a window's header.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxPopupControl.ASPxPopupControl.Windows

summary.para: Gets the collection of windows in the popup control.

member.value: A object which represents the collection of popup windows within the control.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxPopupControl.ASPxPopupControl.AppearAfter

summary.para: Gets or sets the delay in displaying the popup control's popup window.

member.value: An integer value that specifies the time interval, in milliseconds, after which a popup window gets displayed.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxPopupControl.ASPxPopupControl.ClientSideEvents

summary.para: Gets an object that lists the client-side events specific to the current popup control.

member.value: A object which allows assigning handlers to the client-side events available to the popup control.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxPopupControl.ASPxPopupControl.CloseAction

summary.para: Gets or sets a value that specifies which action forces a displayed popup window to close.

member.value: One of the enumeration values.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxPopupControl.ASPxPopupControl.CloseButtonImage

summary.para: Gets settings of an image displayed within a window's close button.

member.value: An object that contains image settings.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxPopupControl.ASPxPopupControl.CloseButtonStyle

summary.para: Gets style settings for a window's close button.

member.value: A object that contains style settings for a window's close button.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxPopupControl.ASPxPopupControl.ContentStyle

summary.para: Gets style settings for a popup window's content region.

member.value: A object that contains style settings for a window's content region.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxPopupControl.ASPxPopupControl.Controls

summary.para: Gets a collection that contains child controls representing a popup window's content.

member.value: A that contains a popup window's child controls.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxPopupControl.ASPxPopupControl.DisappearAfter

summary.para: Gets or sets the delay in hiding the popup control's popup window.

member.value: An integer value that specifies the time interval, in milliseconds, after which a popup window gets hidden.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxPopupControl.ASPxPopupControl.EnableClientSideAPI

summary.para: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the popup control can be manipulated on the client side via code.

member.value: true if the popup control's client object model is fully available; false if no programmatic interface is available for the popup control on the client side.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxPopupControl.ASPxPopupControl.EnableHotTrack

summary.para: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether a popup window can visually respond to mouse hovering.

member.value: true if windows can be hot-tracked; otherwise, false.
